word_group.brief_definition: 债务上限；债务限额；负债上限
撞天花板；撞到天花板；勃然大怒

bilingual.source: The ceiling caved due to the fire.
A gecko can climb on the ceiling.
bilingual.target: 壁虎可以爬在天花板上。

bilingual.source: There is a chandelier on the ceiling.
The ceiling was studded with tiny lights.

bilingual.target: 他们决定重新粉刷天花板。

bilingual.source: The chandelier is hanging from the ceiling.
He hit his kop on the low ceiling.
bilingual.target: 他把头撞在了低矮的天花板上。

bilingual.source: We need to hang the light on the ceiling.
bilingual.target: 我们需要在天花板上吊灯。

bilingual.source: We hired someone to whitewash the ceiling.
bilingual.target: 我们雇了人来粉刷天花板。

list.abstract: ceiling（英 [ˈsiːlɪŋ]，美 [ˈsiːlɪŋ]），英语单词，作名词为天花板；舱内衬板；最高限度。例句：I estimate you have between 210 and 240 square meters of walls and ceiling.（我估计你有210到240平方米的墙壁和天花板。） ceiling的近义词有overhead、high limit。
ceiling，计算机语言。是将参数Number向上舍入（沿绝对值增大的方向）为最接近的 significance 的倍数。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, David, get one for us too. Oh, and see if they have a heart shaped one. And with mirrors on the ceiling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大卫，也帮我们确定一下，还有看看他们有没有心型的床，而且天花板上要有镜子。

yingyinNormal.en: You guys should've seen Leonard when I first met him. There was no eye contact. He was either looking up at the ceiling, or down at his shoes. I'm drunk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们真应该见识一下我最初认识的莱纳德。他都不敢跟人有眼神交流，他不是抬头看天花板，就是低头看他的鞋。我醉了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, it's time for a new family to start their memories here and hopefully their check will clear before they find the crack in the foundation and the asbestos in the ceiling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也该让新的家庭在这里开始他们的新生活了，我希望在支票兑现前他们不会发现地基有裂痕，天花板的石棉瓦破了。

yingyinNormal.en: There are little robots running all over the ceiling, vents on the floor filtering air to keep the place thousands of times cleaner than a hospital operating room, and there are machines everywhere, manipulating chips that are layered with circuitry that's infinitesimally small.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天花板上有许多小白兔在奔跑着，地板上过滤空气让这里比医院的手术室还要干净一千倍，到处都是机器操纵的，芯片是分层的电路，它极其微小。

yingyinNormal.en: Drop your shoes, hold your arms out. Put your palms facing the ceiling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 扔掉鞋子，举起胳膊，手掌向上。

yingyinNormal.en: Your head would hit the ceiling when you hit a pothole. And the heat never worked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 车开过坑，颠一下，你的头就会撞到车顶，暖气永远不制热。

yingyinNormal.en: If a doctor comes to you and inject you with ceiling water, water with some salt, you will experience painless.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果医生过来给你打一针盐水你一点也不痛苦。

yingyinNormal.en: Right. So the only sound I want to hear coming through the ceiling is the sound of sweat dripping onto textbooks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道了，所以我希望待会我能从楼上听到的只有你的汗水滴到课本上的声音。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The Navy Department moved into the east wing in 1879, where elaborate wall and <highlight>ceiling</highlight> stenciling and marquetry floors decorated the office of the Secretary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1879年，海军部迁入东翼，那里的秘书办公室有着精心装饰的墙壁、天花板图案和镶嵌地板。

examination_example.sentence: Quotas get action: they "open the way to equality and they break through the glass <highlight>ceiling</highlight>," according to Reding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据Reding的说法，配额带来的行动“打开了通往平等的道路，并且打破了玻璃天花板”。
识破玻璃天花板（此指隐形顶障）。

examination_example.sentence: I estimate you have between 210 and 240 square meters of walls and <highlight>ceiling</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我估计你有210到240平方米的墙壁和天花板。

examination_example.sentence: The floor-to-<highlight>ceiling</highlight> windows of his company's offices overlook Songdo Central Park, with a canal full of small boats and people fishing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他公司办公室的落地窗俯瞰着松岛中央公园，运河里满是小船和钓鱼的人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I was annoyed in that period and stopped practising, declaring I had reached the <highlight>ceiling</highlight> of my singing career.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那段时间我很恼火，于是停止了练习，宣称自己已经达到了歌唱生涯的顶峰。

examination_example.sentence: The large color decisions in your rooms concern the walls, <highlight>ceilings</highlight>, and floors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 房间主色调的选择与墙壁、天花板和地板有关。
